aircraft.value: Talon Swift - AC-2606-287 at Regional Depot-C

defect_observed.value: Pneumatic starter motor overheat. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.

root_cause.value: Corrosion due to moisture accumulation in sealed compartment

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Pressurization component. Inspection revealed damage to critical components.

corrective_action.value: Replace entire assembly due to extent of damage

preventive_action.value: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage

remarks_investigation.value: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.

remarks_design.value: Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings. Date: 08/09/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type. Date: 10/09/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User perspective considered. Recommend update to operating procedures based on lessons learned. Date: 11/09/2023 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality assurance framework assessed. Investigation process followed established protocols. Findings are valid. Date: 12/09/2023 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 15/09/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Observation
b) Defect Observed: Pneumatic starter motor overheat. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Corrosion due to moisture accumulation in sealed compartment
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Pressurization component. Inspection
revealed damage to critical components.
c) Remedial Measures Replace entire assembly due to extent of damage
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage
d) Attributable Code: N2 - Defect Not Confirmed
